tk.michaelmckey.microcontrollerremote.ui.current_remote

Class CurrentRemoteFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
      • tk.michaelmckey.microcontrollerremote.ui.current_remote.CurrentRemoteFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner, ConnectionListener

    public class CurrentRemoteFragment
extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
implements ConnectionListener
    Manages all user interactions within the Current RemoteEntity screen.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Michael McKey

      • onReceivedMessages

        public void onReceivedMessages(@NonNull
                               java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> unreadMessages)
        Handles new messages. Notifies the user of them and saves any codes received in them. Messages containing Codes are in the form "received_message:[message]".
        Specified by:
        onReceivedMessages in interface ConnectionListener
        Parameters:
        unreadMessages - a list of the new messages that haven't been processed yet

        Creates a dialog popup which allows the user to assign a code to the button. Called when a button on the remote is held down.
